description:
nova service-delete 11-3
ERROR (ClientException): The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-931741d5-4013-477e-93cc-c0c90b302ffe)

the logs shows we need to handle DBError Exception

AND services.id = ? FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY' (0, '11-3')
title: nova service-delete 11-3 returns 500 error

ERROR (ClientException): The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-931741d5-4013-477e-93cc-c0c90b302ffe)

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/217577
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=79a9ca6da345db454f61b82dbd761507141fbddf
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 79a9ca6da345db454f61b82dbd761507141fbddf
Author: He Jie Xu <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Aug 27 16:12:31 2015 +0800

    Add a note about the 400 response not requiring a microversion
    
    As the API validation code always return 400 when request with
    invalid json body, so 400 is an available status code for all the
    Nova API. Then no microversion bump required for fixing 500 to 400.
    
    Change-Id: I0454e95cd0655c910fad8b39ead2b5edab216b68
    Related-Bug: 1471239
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/198753
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=47715e1ea8548d6e2b37c226e762b57db9a5da25
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 47715e1ea8548d6e2b37c226e762b57db9a5da25
Author: jichenjc <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat Jun 20 22:26:00 2015 +0800

    Catch invalid id input in service_delete
    
    service delete will raise 500 error if the service ID
    is invalid. This is caused DBError was raised and nova
    didn't handle it. This patch adds check for the exception
    and handle it in API layer.
    
    The commit 79a9ca6da345db454f61b82dbd761507141fbddf
    clarfy that no microversion is needed.
    
    Closes-Bug: 1471239
    
    Change-Id: Ifde138e72c9a18e01b3f55e188f8d7473ac39133
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
